rows.label: tlk01000902_msg0002
rows.name:
Auntie Correl was so happy,
saying you brought home a bride!

rows.label: tlk01000902_msg0003
rows.name:
She's a really beautiful
lady! Ahh~ Kazuna wants
to have a wedding too!

rows.label: tlk01000902_msg0004
rows.name:
I-it's not like that!
Don't tease me, Kazuna!

rows.label: tlk01000902_msg0101
rows.name:
Martis is really good at
studying. That's why he got
into the theological school.

rows.label: tlk01000902_msg0102
rows.name:
But it makes me a bit sad that
we won't be able to play together
with Kukuri anymore...

rows.label: tlk01000902_msg0103
rows.name:
So until he goes to the
school, I'm going to sit
next to him and watch him!
